name: Casa Viejasa
description:
You can download the game for free, but donations are appreciated, even if it’s just 1$, you might think its not much but I live in Venezuela and you know the rest. I’m 17 years old and made the game alone, without the help of anyone else. I also offer my services as a programmer in case you want me to make you a game with whatever you want. Suggestions in the comments are welcomed to improve the game. Enjoy.

Escape from an old house filled with hands that come out of the floor, boxes, guillotines and bottomless pits to get your well deserved ice cream. To do this, you must first find a key and then unlock the door that leads to the next level.

Try to beat every level as fast as possible.

Controls

|- A/D: Move

|- J: Jump (Hold to jump higher)

|- S: Slide

|- Shift + A/D: Sprint

|- Esc: Pause
